name: Zucchini and Ricotta Roll-Ups
author: lacucinadinadia
summary: This is a delicious and pretty Italian summer appetizer. Raw zucchini are marinated in oil and lemon, then stuffed with a savory ricotta cheese mixture and rolled up. Sprinkle with sesame or poppy seeds before serving.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Pour about 1/2 tablespoon olive oil in a large, shallow dish and season with salt and a dash of lemon juice
Layer zucchini slices closely together in the dish and brush with more olive oil
Sprinkle with additional salt and lemon juice
Repeat with remaining zucchini, olive oil, salt, and lemon juice
Set aside to marinate for 10 to 15 minutes
Combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and parsley in a bowl; mix well
Drain zucchini from marinade, using your fingers to remove excess oil and salt
Transfer 1 zucchini slice to a cutting board
Spoon 1 teaspoon of ricotta mixture onto the top edge and roll up
Arrange on a serving plate, stuffed side down
Repeat with remaining zucchini and filling; sprinkle with sesame seeds
